content: sew the long side together fasten_off and weave in end with another length of yarn again thread the yarn needle and sew up the other long side of the pen holder the pen holder itself is now complete now you will add elastic to the back of it to fit around your notebook cut a length of elastic that is 1 1 ¼ inches longer than the length of your notebook i e 9 ¼ inches in our example using regular sewing thread and a sewing needle sew each end of the elastic to the back of the pen holder so that it allows the elastic to fold around and make a secure holder on the notebook slide the pen holder on to your notebook and you re done i hope you enjoy this quick pattern for a cozy way to secure your pen and keep it handy with your notebook or journal  tag me @rhinoandduckycrochet on instagram i d love to see your makes
